text: Theydon Garnon is a village and civil parish in Epping Forest, Essex, England. In 2001 there were 130 people living in Theydon Garnon. == History == The name Theydon Garnon comes from the family of Gernon. 'Theydon Garnon: Introduction', A History of the County of Essex: Volume 4: Ongar Hundred (1956), pp. 258-262. URL: http://www.british- history.ac.uk/report.aspx?compid=15703 Date accessed: 25 December 2012. Theydon Garnon was listed in the Domesday Book as Taindena / Teidana, along with Theydon Bois and Theydon Mount. == References == == Other websites == * http://www.theydongarnonchurch.co.uk/Home.html Category:Villages in Essex Category:Civil parishes in Essex
title: Theydon Garnon
